elements: Query selector to decide which elements should be modified.
modifiers: Attributes of child elements to be modified.

methods.registerAcceptor(func): This registers a callback function which defines the drop is allowed are not, based on two objects (draggable, droppable) from func args. If func returns true the drop is accepted else rejected.

events.onChange(elements): Triggered when any dom changes occurs inside it. 'elements' is the jquery collection based on selector specified in attributes.
